scripts.build: node build holding; webpack; npm run build-css
scripts.build-css: ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass templates/scss/main.scss -o output/assets/css && ./node_modules/postcss-cli/bin/postcss output/assets/css/main.css --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' -o output/assets/css/main.css && ./node_modules/postcss-cli/bin/postcss output/assets/css/main.css --use cssnano -o output/assets/css/main.css
